thread.title: TECK YONG
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by TECK YONG

author: TECK YONG
title: TECK YONG
text: From start of phone reservation to pick up/drop off- we experienced friendly and professional service. The vehicle that we had was well maintained and in good nick. Unfortunately we had a puncture and fortunately we were covered by the windscreen & tyres clause. Worth paying the premium for this coverage.
